purpose: Provide educational resources and interactive workshops to build intelligent solutions using OpenAI technologies
principle: Leverages OpenAI's APIs and Azure Cognitive Services for hands-on learning experiences in AI and machine learning
reusability: Includes modular workshop materials and examples that can be reused or adapted for educational purposes and training sessions
limitations: Primarily focused on educational use; requires access to OpenAI and Azure services for full functionality
name: OpenAIWorkshop
description: workshop materials to build intelligent solutions on Open AI
highlight: Interactive workshops and tutorials for building AI solutions with OpenAI and Azure
